body: Prerequisites: Dwarf subtype, at least a +2 racial bonus to Constitution; Benefit: Members of this race are immune to paralysis, phantasms, and poison. They also gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities.
name: Duergar Immunities
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Duergar Immunities
